about_the_game:
The Path To You

This is the path that leads to you.

The Story

A broken robot wakes up just before being scrapped.

Guided by a distant “voice,” he moves through the vast ruins.

However, he is unable to change direction at will.

Your mission is to open up his path and lead him to the “owner of the voice”.

Unique operability

The robot is in constant motion and cannot change direction until it hits something.

But you have the power to manipulate the environment.

Rewrite the world by using the two hacking buttons, red and blue.

Red: Materialize blocks and create new footholds.

Blue: Break down barriers and open the way forward.

Manipulate obstacles to hide from your pursuers.

The constraints of the robot and your power.

The combination of the two creates a unique playing experience.

An adventure that tests your wits and ingenuity

A factory scrap line, a futuristic city, an uninhabited amusement park,

And a silent laboratory...

The further you advance, the more obstacles and new tricks you will encounter.

Your inspiration will determine the robot's fate.

Your choices will be the key to saving him.

What lies ahead

The observers chase after the robot,

The crumbling scaffolding, the truth to be revealed.

Will he be happy, sad, or...

The Path To You

This is the path that leads to you.

The Path To You

This is the path that leads to you.

The Story

A broken robot wakes up just before being scrapped.

Guided by a distant “voice,” he moves through the vast ruins.

However, he is unable to change direction at will.

Your mission is to open up his path and lead him to the “owner of the voice”.

Unique operability

The robot is in constant motion and cannot change direction until it hits something.

But you have the power to manipulate the environment.

Rewrite the world by using the two hacking buttons, red and blue.

Red: Materialize blocks and create new footholds.

Blue: Break down barriers and open the way forward.

Manipulate obstacles to hide from your pursuers.

The constraints of the robot and your power.

The combination of the two creates a unique playing experience.

An adventure that tests your wits and ingenuity

A factory scrap line, a futuristic city, an uninhabited amusement park,

And a silent laboratory...

The further you advance, the more obstacles and new tricks you will encounter.

The crumbling scaffolding, the truth to be revealed.

Will he be happy, sad, or...

The Path To You

This is the path that leads to you.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Sequoia 15.3
  • Processor: Apple M1 または インテルCore M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 512 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Sequoia 15.3
  • Processor: Apple M1 または インテルCore M
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1024 GB available space

name: Path To You
short_description: "Path To You" is a puzzle-action game where a malfunctioning robot awakens moments before being scrapped, drawn by a mysterious call. The robot moves autonomously but can't change direction. Players must guide it using red and blue hacking controls to manipulate obstacles and enemies.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Indonesian, Ukrainian, Dutch, Greek, Swedish, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Czech, Danish, Turkish, Norwegian, Hungarian, Finnish, Bulgarian, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Icelandic, Irish, Azerbaijani, Assamese, Afrikaans, Amharic, Albanian, Armenian, Igbo, Uyghur, Welsh, Wolof, Uzbek, Urdu, Estonian, Odia, Kazakh, Catalan, Kannada, Galician, K'iche', Kyrgyz, Khmer, Croatian, Gujarati, Quechua, Xhosa, Konkani, Sindhi, Sinhala, Georgian, Scots, Slovak, Slovenian, Swahili, Zulu, Serbian, Sotho, Sorani, Tajik, Tatar, Tamil, Dari, Cherokee, Tswana, Tigrinya, Telugu, Turkmen, Nepali, Hausa, Basque, Valencian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Hindi, Filipino, Hebrew, Belarusian, Bangla, Persian, Bosnian, Maori, Macedonian, Malayalam, Marathi, Maltese, Malay, Mongolian, Yoruba, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Kinyarwanda
